00029 #ifndef __BMESH_OPERATOR_API_INLINE_H__
00030 #define __BMESH_OPERATOR_API_INLINE_H__
00031 
00032 /* tool flag API. never, ever ever should tool code put junk in
00033  * header flags (element->head.flag), nor should they use
00034  * element->head.eflag1/eflag2.  instead, use this api to set
00035  * flags.
00036  *
00037  * if you need to store a value per element, use a
00038  * ghash or a mapping slot to do it. */
00039 
00040 /* flags 15 and 16 (1 << 14 and 1 << 15) are reserved for bmesh api use */
00041 BLI_INLINE short _bmo_elem_flag_test(BMesh *bm, BMFlagLayer *oflags, const short oflag)
00042 {
00043     return oflags[bm->stackdepth - 1].f & oflag;
00044 }
00045 
00046 BLI_INLINE short _bmo_elem_flag_test_bool(BMesh *bm, BMFlagLayer *oflags, const short oflag)
00047 {
00048     return (oflags[bm->stackdepth - 1].f & oflag) != 0;
00049 }
00050 
00051 BLI_INLINE void _bmo_elem_flag_enable(BMesh *bm, BMFlagLayer *oflags, const short oflag)
00052 {
00053     oflags[bm->stackdepth - 1].f |= oflag;
00054 }
00055 
00056 BLI_INLINE void _bmo_elem_flag_disable(BMesh *bm, BMFlagLayer *oflags, const short oflag)
00057 {
00058     oflags[bm->stackdepth - 1].f &= ~oflag;
00059 }
00060 
00061 BLI_INLINE void _bmo_elem_flag_set(BMesh *bm, BMFlagLayer *oflags, const short oflag, int val)
00062 {
00063     if (val) oflags[bm->stackdepth - 1].f |= oflag;
00064     else     oflags[bm->stackdepth - 1].f &= ~oflag;
00065 }
00066 
00067 BLI_INLINE void _bmo_elem_flag_toggle(BMesh *bm, BMFlagLayer *oflags, const short oflag)
00068 {
00069     oflags[bm->stackdepth - 1].f ^= oflag;
00070 }
00071 
00072 BLI_INLINE void BMO_slot_map_int_insert(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00073                                         void *element, int val)
00074 {
00075     BMO_slot_map_insert(bm, op, slotname, element, &val, sizeof(int));
00076 }
00077 
00078 BLI_INLINE void BMO_slot_map_float_insert(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00079                                           void *element, float val)
00080 {
00081     BMO_slot_map_insert(bm, op, slotname, element, &val, sizeof(float));
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 /* pointer versions of BMO_slot_map_float_get and BMO_slot_map_float_insert.
00086  *
00087  * do NOT use these for non-operator-api-allocated memory! instead
00088  * use BMO_slot_map_data_get and BMO_slot_map_insert, which copies the data. */
00089 
00090 BLI_INLINE void BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00091                                         void *element, void *val)
00092 {
00093     BMO_slot_map_insert(bm, op, slotname, element, &val, sizeof(void *));
00094 }
00095 
00096 BLI_INLINE int BMO_slot_map_contains(BMesh *UNUSED(bm), BMOperator *op, const char *slotname, void *element)
00097 {
00098     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00099     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING);
00100 
00101     /* sanity check */
00102     if (!slot->data.ghash) return 0;
00103 
00104     return BLI_ghash_haskey(slot->data.ghash, element);
00105 }
00106 
00107 BLI_INLINE void *BMO_slot_map_data_get(BMesh *UNUSED(bm), BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00108                                        void *element)
00109 {
00110     BMOElemMapping *mapping;
00111     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00112     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING);
00113 
00114     /* sanity check */
00115     if (!slot->data.ghash) return NULL;
00116 
00117     mapping = (BMOElemMapping *)BLI_ghash_lookup(slot->data.ghash, element);
00118 
00119     if (!mapping) return NULL;
00120 
00121     return mapping + 1;
00122 }
00123 
00124 BLI_INLINE float BMO_slot_map_float_get(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00125                                         void *element)
00126 {
00127     float *val = (float *) BMO_slot_map_data_get(bm, op, slotname, element);
00128     if (val) return *val;
00129 
00130     return 0.0f;
00131 }
00132 
00133 BLI_INLINE int BMO_slot_map_int_get(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00134                                     void *element)
00135 {
00136     int *val = (int *) BMO_slot_map_data_get(bm, op, slotname, element);
00137     if (val) return *val;
00138 
00139     return 0;
00140 }
00141 
00142 BLI_INLINE void *BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00143                                       void *element)
00144 {
00145     void **val = (void **) BMO_slot_map_data_get(bm, op, slotname, element);
00146     if (val) return *val;
00147 
00148     return NULL;
00149 }
00150 
00151 #endif /* __BMESH_OPERATOR_API_INLINE_H__ */
